name: BGS Kickstarter Game Pack
description:
Made available to our Kickstarter backers, the BGS Kickstarter Game Pack is a collection of games made by members and friends of Buffalo Game Space! It includes titles such as:

  • Shutshimi
  • Botrunner
  • Island Dice (PnP Edition)
  • Meowgical Tower
  • House Rules
  • and more!

Each purchase of the Game Pack helps support Buffalo Game Space, a non-profit organization dedicated to nurturing the growing game development industry in and around Buffalo, NY. This pack began as a reward tier for our Kickstarter backers, but now we've opened it up to any and all developers who'd like to add to their own asset libraries! So please consider purchasing this pack today, and gain some excellent work for your own games and help a non-profit at the same time!
